verses.verse: In <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah, do I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>: Let me <S%H408>never<s%> be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6403>rescue<s%> <S%H5186>me<s%>: Bow down thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H3467>me<s%>, and save me.

Be thou to me a <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H4583>habitation<s%>, whereunto I may <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H935>resort<s%>: Thou hast given <S%H6680>commandment<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5553>me<s%>; For thou art my rock and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>.
Rescue <S%H6403><s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O my God, out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, Out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H5765>unrighteous<s%> and cruel <S%H2556>man<s%>.
For thou art my <S%H8615>hope<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Thou art my <S%H4009>trust<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

By thee have I been holden <S%H5564>up<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%>; Thou art he that <S%H1491>took<s%> me out of my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H4578>bowels<s%>: My <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall be continually of <S%H8548>thee<s%>.
I am as a <S%H4159>wonder<s%> unto <S%H7227>many<s%>; But thou art my <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4268>refuge<s%>.
My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with thy <S%H8416>praise<s%>, And with thy <S%H8597>honor<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Cast me not <S%H7993>off<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of old <S%H2209>age<s%>; <S%H5800>Forsake<s%> me not when my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3615>faileth<s%>.
For mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> concerning <S%H8104>me<s%>; And they that watch for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> take <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>,
Saying <S%H559><s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H7291>him<s%>: Pursue and <S%H8610>take<s%> <S%H5337>him<s%>; For there is none to deliver.
O <S%H430>God<s%>, be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H430>me<s%>; O my God, make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to help <S%H5833>me<s%>.

Let them be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> that are <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; Let them be <S%H5844>covered<s%> with <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
But I will <S%H3176>hope<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, And will <S%H8416>praise<s%> thee yet <S%H3254>more<s%> and <S%H3254>more<s%>.

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H5608>tell<s%> of thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, And of thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>; For I <S%H3045>know<s%> not the numbers <S%H5615>thereof<s%>.
I will <S%H935>come<s%> with the <S%H1369>mighty<s%> acts of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, even of thine only.
O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou hast <S%H3925>taught<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%>; And hitherto have I <S%H5046>declared<s%> thy wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>.

Yea <S%H5704><s%>, even when I am <S%H2209>old<s%> and <S%H7872>grayheaded<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me <S%H5046>not<s%>, Until I have declared thy <S%H2220>strength<s%> unto the next <S%H1755>generation<s%>, Thy <S%H1369>might<s%> to every one that is to <S%H935>come<s%>.
Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H430>also<s%>, O God, is very <S%H4791>high<s%>; Thou who hast <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, who is like unto thee?

Thou <S%H7200><s%>, who hast showed us <S%H7227>many<s%> and <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%>, Wilt <S%H2421>quicken<s%> us <S%H7725>again<s%>, And wilt bring us <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H8415>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Increase <S%H7235><s%> thou my <S%H1420>greatness<s%>, And turn <S%H5437>again<s%> and comfort <S%H5162>me<s%>.

I will also <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee with the <S%H3627>psaltery<s%>, Even thy <S%H571>truth<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>: Unto thee will I <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises with the <S%H3658>harp<s%>, O thou Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
My <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall shout for <S%H7442>joy<s%> when I <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises unto <S%H5315>thee<s%>; And my soul, which thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%>.

My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> also shall <S%H1897>talk<s%> of thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H954>long<s%>; For they are put to shame, for they are <S%H954>confounded<s%>, that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
